import React from 'react'; const Coin =({coin:{image, name, symbol, current_price, market_cap,price_change_percentage_24h,total_volume}})=>{ return(

{name}

{symbol}

Rs.{current_price.toLocaleString()}

Rs.{total_volume.toLocaleString()}

0) ? "green " : "red "}>{price_change_percentage_24h.toLocaleString()}%

Market Cap.{market_cap}

) } export default Coin;
